content: 安装Caddy2 1 2 3 4 5 sudo apt install -y debian-keyring debian-archive-keyring apt-transport-https curl -1sLf 'https://dl.cloudsmith.io/public/caddy/stable/gpg.key' | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/caddy-stable-archive-keyring.gpg curl -1sLf 'https://dl.cloudsmith.io/public/caddy/stable/debian.deb.txt' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/caddy-stable.list sudo apt update sudo apt install caddy 编辑Caddyfile文件 1 vi /etc/caddy/Caddyfile 配置反向代理 1 2 3 xx.xx.xx{ reverse_proxy localhost:8000 } 其他Caddy命令 1 2 3 4 5 6 systemctl enable caddy.service # 开机启动 systemctl start caddy.service # 启动 systemctl stop caddy.service # 停止 systemctl restart caddy.service # 重启 systemctl status caddy.service # 查看状态 systemctl daemon-reload # 重载配置
title: 部署Caddy2，快速配置反向代理。
